title: Poop Clicker
description:
Yes, we know it's a bit of a messy situation, but we need your plumbing skills!  Play Poop Clicker, a free idle game with an odd twist; you get to be a dedicated plumber.  Click on the poo-poo on the screen to earn fantastic rewards! Â 
While your friends dream of glamorous careers and having cool jobs like astronauts or athletes, you've chosen a different path for being a sewer guy!
